thread.title: Video released of police tackling Oklahoma QB Baker Mayfield
thread.title_full: Video released of police tackling Oklahoma QB Baker Mayfield

title: Video released of police tackling Oklahoma QB Baker Mayfield
text:
Mar 10, 2017 at 6:56p ET 0Shares 
Video of the February arrest of Oklahoma quarterback Baker Mayfield by Fayetteville (Arkansas) police on misdemeanor complaints of public intoxication, disorderly conduct and fleeing and resisting arrest was released on Friday. 
40/29 News posted dash-cam footage of the arrest released by the police department, and it shows Mayfield attempting to flee and being brought down heavily by officers. Here's the Baker Mayfield arrest video. Nice wrap up by the wall. pic.twitter.com/VOEFZj0D88 
— Bunkie Perkins (@BunkiePerkins) March 10, 2017 
Mayfield issued a public apology for his actions after his arrest. 
— Baker Mayfield (@baker_mayfield6) February 28, 2017 
A 2016 Heisman Trophy finalist, Mayfield threw for 3,950 yards and 40 touchdowns in 2016. He’s projected as a late-round draft pick and borderline NFL prospect, but intends to return to Oklahoma for the 2017 season.
